QuestData.Title: Hero's Call: Eastern Plaguelands!
QuestData.Description: By order of his royal highness, King Anduin Wrynn, all able-bodied citizens of the Alliance are to report to Fiona on the east bank of the Thondroril River.$B$BThe Argent Crusade needs your help to win back the Eastern Plaguelands from the grasp of the Scourge.$B$BTo reach the Eastern Plaguelands, cross the Thondroril River from the Western Plaguelands and look for Fiona on the eastern bank.$B$BFor the glory and honor of the Alliance!
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Fiona on the eastern bank of the Thondroril River in the Eastern Plaguelands.
